## CommunicationObserver.useResume property

Setups a callback that resumes reading of next data, it is called whenever [CommunicationObserver.next()](./influxdb3-client.communicationobserver.next.md) returns `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useResume?: (resume: () => void) => void;
```
